patthana17.14:1.1: Akusalaṁ micchattaniyataṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca naakusalo namicchattaniyato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā tīṇi, adhipatiyā tīṇi …pe… avigate tīṇi.
patthana17.14:2.1: Kusalaṁ sammattaniyataṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nakusalo nasammattaniyato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā tīṇi, adhipatiyā tīṇi …pe… avigate tīṇi.
patthana17.14:3.1: Abyākataṁ aniyataṁ dhammaṁ paccayā naabyākato naaniyato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā pañca …pe… avigate pañca.
